name: hft-crypto-trading-system
description: High-frequency cryptocurrency trading system with real-time market data processing

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:services"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "cd services/data && npm run dev" "cd services/trading && npm run dev" "cd services/monitoring && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: cd services/data && npm run build && cd ../trading && npm run build && cd ../monitoring && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:services
scripts.test:services: cd services/data && npm run test && cd ../trading && npm run test

author: Trading Infrastructure Team
